# Default setting is building on ubuntu:16.04
ARG UBUNTU_VERSION=16.04

FROM ubuntu:${UBUNTU_VERSION}

# Ensure apt-get won't prompt for selecting options
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
            software-properties-common \
            build-essential \
            cmake \
            git \
            libopencv-dev \
            libopencv-core-dev \
            libssl-dev \
            libtool \
            pkg-config && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Build the custom backend library and example custom backends
WORKDIR /workspace
COPY VERSION VERSION
COPY build build
COPY src/backends/custom/custom.h src/backends/custom/custom.h
COPY src/custom src/custom
COPY src/core src/core

# The build can fail the first time due to a protobuf_generate_cpp
# error that doesn't repeat on subsequent builds, which is why there
# are 2 make invocations below.
RUN (cd build && \
            cmake -DTRTIS_ENABLE_GPU=OFF \
                  -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \
                  -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=/workspace/install/custom-backend-sdk && \
            (make -j16 trtis-custom-backends || true) && \
            make -j16 trtis-custom-backends) && \
    export VERSION=`cat /workspace/VERSION` && \
    (cd install && tar zcf /workspace/v$VERSION.custombackend.tar.gz custom-backend-sdk)
